appSubtitle: Extract product data from PDF catalogs with AI.
apiKeyMissingError: Error: Gemini API Key is not configured. Please set it in the settings.
apiKeyCustomKeyMissingError: Error: Custom API key is selected but not provided. Please set it in the settings.
processLogNoPages: Warning: No pages selected for processing. Aborting.
processLogRendering: Preprocessing: Rendering selected PDF pages into images...
processLogNoProducts: Info: No products found on page {{page}}.
fileUploadDrag: Drag 'n' drop some PDF files here, or click to select files
idleViewBody: Upload your PDF catalogs, select the pages you want to process, and click 'Extract Data' to begin.
loadingViewBody: The AI is analyzing the pages. This might take a few moments depending on the number of pages.
emptyResultsViewBody: The extraction process completed, but no structured product data could be found on the selected pages.
errorViewBody: An unexpected error stopped the process. Check the logs for more details.
helpModalIntro: This application uses Google's Gemini AI to analyze PDF catalog pages, identify products, and extract their information into a structured format.
helpModalUsageStep1: Upload one or more PDF files using the upload box.
helpModalUsageStep2: Select the specific pages from each file you wish to analyze.
helpModalUsageStep3: Click the 'Extract Data' button to start the process.
helpModalUsageStep4: Review the extracted products and export them in your desired format (JSON, CSV, or Markdown).
helpModalSchemaDesc: The data is extracted into the following JSON structure:
helpModalFidelityNoteBody: The AI aims for high accuracy, but results can vary based on catalog layout and image quality. Always review the extracted data.
apiKeyModalBody1: This application requires a Google Gemini API key to function. You can use the default key or provide your own.
